title: Is there any tool to check articles for Spinning? - Quora

response.answer_text: I own a blog Home and need articles regularly. Many a times I get the doubt whether the articles given to me are original or spun articles. Spinning is not a good option for bloggers. Hence, I am looking for a tool which can detect whether the article is original or spun. I am getting suggestions and tools for spinning the article, which I am not keen about. I want tool to detect if article spinning is done or the writer has written it by himself. Thanks in advance.

I think the point was missed. You don’t want to spin, you want to check them for spinning correct? If so, copyscape is your best bet. It’s usually pretty obvious if it’s been spun poorly just by reading it
